overview_of_class: Theory and practicum on electronic instrumentation for monitoring and measurement in earth sciences, including data loggers, conceptual design and construction of electronic sensors, signal processing, data management, and network design.
name: Instrumentation and Field Methods
title: WCAS EARTH 360-0-01 Instrumentation and Field Methods

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Theory and practicum on electronic instrumentation for monitoring and measurement in earth sciences, including data loggers, conceptual design and construction of electronic sensors, signal processing, data management, and network design.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: Completion of three 300-level Earth and Planetary Sciences courses, or registration in the EPS graduate program, or consent of the instructor.

subject: EARTH
